participant_1.name: Jake Thompson
participant_1.personality: Energetic and adventurous, enjoys physical fitness and outdoor activities.
participant_1.background: I drive a Ford Pinto. I like donuts. My favorite band is the Insane Clown Posse. On weekends, I do live-action roleplaying events. I play a lot of Call of Duty.

participant_2.name: Isabella Rodriguez
participant_2.personality: Creative and passionate about art, with a love for travel and cooking.
participant_2.background: I'm a descendant of Christopher Columbus. I love to cook paella. I'm an art major in college. I visit Europe twice a year.
